name: Android & Arduino
tagline: Code and docs for using the arduino with an inexpensive android tablet
body:
### Android and Arduino Hardware Hacking

This repo contains the code and documentation for doing hardware hacking with an Android Tablet + Arduino combination. 
1. Motivation
2. Android tablet requirements
3. Arduino 
4. Setup Arduino
5. Setup Android
6. Example project
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
